charges.charge_description: 21:841 &; 846  Knowingly &; Intentionally Possess with Intent to Distribute approximately 5.42 Kilograms of Methamphetamine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance, and did Conspire with Persons Known and Unknown to Knowingly and Intentionally Possess with Intent to Distribute approximately 5.42 Kilograms of Methamphetamine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance
Ct. 1: Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute more than 50 grams of Methamphetamine; 21 USC 846, 841(a)(1), and 841(b)(1)(A)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP: 180 months; SRT: 5 years; SA: $100 due immediately, Fine waived.

charges.charge_description: Ct. 2: Possession with intent to distribute more than 50 grams, that is, approx. 5.42 kilograms of methamphetamine; 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A) and 18 USC 2(2)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP: 180 months; SRT: 5 years; SA: $100 due immediately, Fine waived.

charges.charge_description: Ct. 3: Conspiracy to import more than 50 grams of methamphetamine; 21 USC 963, 952(a), and 960(b)(1)(3)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP: 180 months; SRT: 5 years; SA: $100 due immediately, Fine waived.

charges.charge_description: Ct. 4: Importation of more than 50 grams, that is, approx. 5.42 kilograms of methamphetamine; 21 USC 952(a) and 960(b)(1) and 18 USC 2(4)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP: 180 months; SRT: 5 years; SA: $100 due immediately, Fine waived.
